title: Bobby Has Valentine's Day Plans For First Time In Years + Jake Owen Sent Bobby Special Video + Bobby’s Mailbag: Girl Wants Guy Friend Gym Partner Over Her Boyfriend
itunes:title: Bobby Has Valentine's Day Plans For First Time In Years + Jake Owen Sent Bobby Special Video + Bobby’s Mailbag: Girl Wants Guy Friend Gym Partner Over Her Boyfriend
description:
Bobby has been hinting at his dating life taking a turn. He's made several comments that have made listeners think he's dating someone…turns out now he has Valentine’s Day plans. Jake Owen got Bobby a special video made for him from one of his favorite TV shows. Bobby opens up the mailbag about a girl whose boyfriend won’t go to the gym with her so she wants to ask a guy friend to be her partner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
